page.title: 11GOVERNMENT. (2.)
page.content: {Services provided by the County and {Local Authorities. Ambulance and Hospital car service. Careers Advice. Education and School Transport. Fire Services. (Stations at Tenbury and Leominster.) Highways - This covers road maintenance, mowing and trimming roadside verges and hedges,road sweeping,drainage and in winter - snow clearing,gritting and salting. Home Help Service. Mobile Library visits the area monthly Police - West Mercia Police with stations at Leominster and Tenbury. Probations and Social Services. Trading Standards covering Animal Health, Weights and Measures. Youth Services. Refuge Collection - this is done fortnightly.
